ygData.subject: Functional testing of RESTful web apps

Does anybody have experiences with functional testing of RESTful we=
b
applications? Any tools that work well for you? I looked into FunkLoad
(h=
ttp://funkload.nuxeo.org), which has everything i need, but only for
GET/PO=
ST/Form focused web applications.

Thanks in advance,
Robert
